name: journalVolumeIssue
displayName: Indicates the volume, issue and date of a journal, which this Dataset is associated with.

name: journalVolume
displayName: The journal volume which this Dataset is associated with (e.g., Volume 4).

name: journalIssue
displayName: The journal issue number which this Dataset is associated with (e.g., Number 2, Autumn).

name: journalPubDate
displayName: The publication date for this journal volume/issue, which this Dataset is associated with (e.g., 1999).

name: journalArticleType
displayName: Indicates what kind of article this is, for example, a research article, a commentary, a book or product review, a case report, a calendar, etc (based on JATS).
